short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your search provider to mysafesearch.co

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sets the browser's default search to mysafesearch.co to give you a customized safe search experience powered by mysafesearch.co. 

PERMISSIONS 
1. Read and change your information on mysafesearch.co: This helps us identify any abuse of our APIs and/or our services and spam. This permission is needed to modify information only on our domains and does not change or read data from any other domain that a user visits. 
2. Read your web search history: This lets us create a personalized experience for the user. Apart from this, we don’t attempt to read or access any user’s browsing history. 
3. Change your browsing setting to mysafesearch.co: This lets the extension configure your browser search bar with mysafesearch.co. 
If you have any ideas or inputs on how we can improve the product, please share your feedback. We value your suggestions. Please note that this extension can be uninstalled whenever you choose. 

Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this Chrome™ extension.
